mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_IDX, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_TYPE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEMBER_IDX, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_TYPE ) VALUES ( ( SELECT #{userType}||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD')||LPAD(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MEMBER_IDX, -3)))+1, 3, 0) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_IDX LIKE '%'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD')||'%' ), #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userEmail}, #{userType} )
